languages.text: "Я избавлю ее душу от страданий, но тело ей вернуть, увы, не в моих силах".

traits.locale_text: "Я избавлю ее душу от страданий, но тело ей вернуть, увы, не в моих силах".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "I will release her soul from its suffering, but alas, giving her back her body is beyond my ability."
languages.original_text: "Я избавлю ее душу от страданий, но тело ей вернуть, увы, не в моих силах".

traits.locale_text: "I will release her soul from its suffering, but alas, giving her back her body is beyond my ability."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "I will release her soul from its suffering, but alas, giving her back her body is beyond my ability."

traits.locale_text: "I will release her soul from its suffering, but alas, giving her back her body is beyond my ability."

traits.locale_text: "I will release her soul from its suffering, but alas, giving her back her body is beyond my ability."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "I will release her soul from its suffering, but alas, giving her back her body is beyond my ability."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Puedo liberar su alma de su sufrimiento, pero me temo que devolverle su cuerpo físico va más allá de mis capacidades».
languages.original_text: "I will release her soul from its suffering, but alas, giving her back her body is beyond my ability."

traits.locale_text: «Puedo liberar su alma de su sufrimiento, pero me temo que devolverle su cuerpo físico va más allá de mis capacidades».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「彼女の魂を苦しみから解放しよう。しかし残念だが、私の能力では肉体まで戻すことはできん」
languages.original_text: "I will release her soul from its suffering, but alas, giving her back her body is beyond my ability."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女の魂を苦しみから解放しよう。しかし残念だが、私の能力では肉体まで戻すことはできん」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “我会让她的灵魂从痛苦中解脱，但遗憾的是，我无法恢复她的躯体。”
languages.original_text: "I will release her soul from its suffering, but alas, giving her back her body is beyond my ability."

traits.locale_text: “我会让她的灵魂从痛苦中解脱，但遗憾的是，我无法恢复她的躯体。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Je libérerai son âme de la souffrance qu'elle endure, mais hélas, il est au-delà de mes capacités de lui rendre son corps. »
languages.original_text: "I will release her soul from its suffering, but alas, giving her back her body is beyond my ability."

traits.locale_text: « Je libérerai son âme de la souffrance qu'elle endure, mais hélas, il est au-delà de mes capacités de lui rendre son corps. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Ich werde ihre Seele von ihrem Leiden erlösen, aber leider habe ich nicht die Fähigkeit, ihr auch ihren Körper zurückzugeben."
languages.original_text: "I will release her soul from its suffering, but alas, giving her back her body is beyond my ability."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde ihre Seele von ihrem Leiden erlösen, aber leider habe ich nicht die Fähigkeit, ihr auch ihren Körper zurückzugeben."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Ruhunu çektiği acılardan kurtarabilirim ancak ne yazık ki bedenini geri vermek, kabiliyetlerimin çok ötesinde."
languages.original_text: "I will release her soul from its suffering, but alas, giving her back her body is beyond my ability."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhunu çektiği acılardan kurtarabilirim ancak ne yazık ki bedenini geri vermek, kabiliyetlerimin çok ötesinde."
